>no.. i'm more of a neutral guy. not good or bad. like a >is warrior taken? >i'd be a warrior for hire. i kind of >like Vargrillion as a nick. if warrior is taken to, >could u supply a list of what is taken?

Ok, let's see....
We've got:
Trahern - Elf (doesn't throw rocks)
Tevildo - mage (more spells than the ones in glad)
Bjorn - Thief
Hightower - Barbarian
Owahn Khaat - Thief's guild guy
Deathifier - cleric
and at the start of chapter 3, I introduce one of the bad guys. his name's already going to a friend of mine, so he's kind of taken.
If you want to be a thief, we'll probably be meeting some more guys from the Saervii in awhile. If you can think of something more interesting than a thief and isn't already taken (and won't dominate the story, like a fire elemental or something) just let me know.

Try and send me a name, a character profile (3 sentences would be nice) skills, hobbies and his/her general attitude. Plus a reason for joining the quest.

-Trahern
